summary: Offline-capable school database management system for Mark Finley Adventist Preparatory School (Windows desktop or local web app) with role-based access, dashboards, admissions, classes/parents, staff, finance, exams, SMS notifications, reporting, and offline backup/restore for LAN multi-user use.
architectural_notes: Offline-first system running on a single PC or local server with no internet dependency
Local database required (e.g., SQLite or MySQL) with proper relational schema for students/parents/classes/staff/finance/exams/SMS logs
Role-based access control with separate module permissions per role (Headmaster full; Accountant finance-only; Exams Coordinator exams-only)
Support LAN multi-user usage within the school environment
Backup/restore and data export to external drive; include a system restore option
SMS delivery via GSM modem for offline sending; optionally integrate an SMS API when internet is available
Security: encryption for sensitive data, audit logging of user actions, inactivity auto-logout, backup reminders

existing_features.title: Implement secure role-based authentication with the roles Headmaster, Accountant, and Exams Coordinator, including username/password login, change password, logout, and role-based access enforcement across all modules.
Add Headmaster-only user management to create, edit, disable, and reset passwords for system users, assigning one of the supported roles to each user.
Create the post-login main dashboard with school branding placeholders and quick statistics, plus a sidebar navigation with large buttons and module icons.

Implement Admission Management module with (A) New Admission CRUD including auto-generated Student ID, parent details, photo upload, search, and printable student record; (B) Transfer workflow; and (C) Dismissal workflow including an approval section.

Implement Class Management module with class list (class name, class teacher, student list, total count) and parents list (parent name, phone number, linked students, address), including search/filter, printable class list, and export to PDF/Excel.
Implement Staff Management module with staff CRUD (including photo upload), staff transfer records, staff dismissal records, and a searchable staff directory.

Implement Finance Management module (Headmaster + Accountant only) to record revenue (school fees, canteen collection, school store sales), track expenses, generate receipts for school fee payments, and produce financial reports (monthly, termly, annual, profit & loss) including printable reports and charts/graphs.

Implement Exams Management module (Headmaster + Exams Coordinator only) for marks recording with auto-calculated totals, grades, positions, remarks, and report generation including student report card, class performance summary, subject analysis, printable report cards, and export to PDF.

Add SMS Notification module UI and backend logging: support composing individual and bulk messages to targeted groups (entire class, all parents, students with outstanding fees), templates, automated alert triggers, SMS history log, delivery status, and date/time sent. Where direct sending is not possible in-browser, provide a clearly labeled 'Send (Simulated)' mode that records to history and marks status accordingly.

Implement offline-first behavior suitable for a local deployment: the frontend must remain usable without an internet connection for viewing previously loaded data and for queuing data-entry actions, and must sync queued actions when connectivity is restored.
Add backup, restore, and export features: allow an authorized user to export the full dataset to a file, restore from an exported file, and show a backup reminder in the UI.

Implement security features: role-based permissions (enforced in backend), audit trail of user activities across modules, automatic logout after inactivity, and encryption of sensitive stored data where feasible within the platform.

Apply a coherent, professional school-themed visual design across the app (colors, typography, layout) with sidebar navigation, clear section headers, and consistent iconography; do not use a blue/purple primary palette.
Add generated static image assets for a logo placeholder and module icons, and render them from frontend static assets (do not serve images through the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement secure role-based authentication (Headmaster, Accountant, Exams Coordinator) with change password, logout, role-based dashboards, and user management
Build main dashboard UI with school branding placeholders, quick statistics, and sidebar navigation
Admission management module: new admission (auto student ID, parent details, photo), transfer, dismissal, and CRUD/print/search
Class management module: class list, student lists/counts, parents list, search/filter, print, export to PDF/Excel
Staff management module: staff records with photo, transfers, dismissals, staff directory and search
Finance management module (Headmaster/Accountant only): fees & other revenue, expenses tracking, receipts, reports, charts/graphs
Exams management module (Headmaster/Exams Coordinator only): marks entry, auto totals/grades/positions, report cards, analytics, PDF export/printing
SMS notification system: individual/bulk/automated alerts, GSM modem offline sending + optional online SMS API, history log and delivery status
Offline-first deployment: local database storage, Windows installability, LAN multi-user support, backup/restore, export to external drive, system restore
Security and audit features: role permissions, data encryption, audit trail, auto-logout on inactivity, backup reminders
Professional school-themed responsive UI: buttons/icons per module, school colors, footer contact details, tablet/desktop responsiveness

Model and persist data with proper relationships between Students, Parents, Classes, Staff, Finance records, Exams, and SMS logs, ensuring data integrity and scalable querying for dashboards and reports.
